name: docusaurus-plugin-typedoc
description: A Docusaurus v2 plugin to build API documentation with TypeDoc.

scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run lint && npm run build && npm run test
scripts.demo:start: rm -rf ./docs/api && npm run build && cd demo && npm run start
scripts.demo:build-and-serve: npm run build && cd demo && npm run build && npm run serve
scripts.demo:init: rm -rf demo && npx @docusaurus/init@next init demo classic
scripts.build-and-test: npm run build && npm run test

author: Thomas Grey
